title: Samsung brings Digital Key feature to the US with the GV60 Genesis EV
content:
Many phone makers, including Samsung, have been trying to turn their smartphones into digital car keys. The South Korean giant joined the party early last year when it announced the Digital Key feature at its first Galaxy Unpacked event. The feature started rolling out in its home market in September last year, but it offered

The post Samsung brings Digital Key feature to the US with the GV60 Genesis EV appeared first on XDA.
description: Samsung has announced that it's bringing its Digital Key feature to the US with the new 2023 Genesis GV60 EV.
